name: CheltenhamFestival
0:
”Alexa, ask Cheltenham Festival for some tips.”
”Alexa, ask Cheltenham Festival for the latest going.”
”Alexa, ask Cheltenham Festival for today's non-runners.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cheltenham festival
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get everything you need in the run up to, and during, the Cheltenham Festival from Alexa.

- Tips -
"Alexa, ask Cheltenham Festival for some tips"
> Alexa will provide tips for the following day's racing.

- Results -
"Alexa, ask Cheltenham Festival for the results for day one"
> Alexa give you the results of every race updated as soon as possible after each race for the day requested.

- Non-runners -
"Alexa, ask Cheltenham Festival for today's non-runners"
> Alexa will tell you about any non-runners for that day.

- Going -
"Alexa, ask Cheltenham Festival for the latest going"
> Alexa will give you the latest going update from the course.

- Schedule -
"Alexa, ask Cheltenham Festival for the schedule for day one"
> Alexa will give you information about the feature race and the full race schedule for the day requested.

- Countdown -
"Alexa, ask Cheltenham Festival how long until the Festival starts"
> Alexa will tell you how long until the first race down to the minute.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
